remarks: Axiom of Choice equivalent.  By using restricted quantifiers, we can express the Axiom of Choice with a single explicit conjunction.  (If you want to figure it out, the rewritten equivalent ~ ac3 is easier to understand.)  Note: ~ aceq0 shows the logical equivalence to ~ ax-ac . (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 18-Jul-1996.)
statement:
ac2 $p |- E. y A. z e. x A. w e. z E! v e. z E. u e. y ( z e. u /\ v e. u ) $.
$d u v w x y z $.
